ValidationRule.description: Zip Code must contain at least 5 numbers.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won") && LEN( Account.BillingPostalCode) < 5 && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c, "Simply Retirement")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "PEP")) && NOT(ISNULL(AccountId )) && NOT( Campaign_Code__c = "Single(k) Long") && NOT( Campaign_Code__c = "Single(k) Short") && NOT( Campaign_Code__c = "Single(k) Plus Long") && NOT( Campaign_Code__c = "Single(k) Plus Short") && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Service_Option__c, "Custom(k) MML"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Zip Code must be 5 numbers. Please edit field on account page.
